feed.title: Fort St. John - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Fort St. John
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:04 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Freezing Fog, -10.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 03:55 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Condition: Freezing Fog
Temperature: -10.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -12.1°C
Wind: ESE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Fog dissipating. High minus 8.
